QuestData.Title: Idle Hands
QuestData.Description: If you want my help then you are going to need to help me first.$b$bThere is a group of spriggans that have assaulted the growthworks to the northeast. They are causing all manner of havoc and I simply will not abide this trespass into my lands.$b$bGo there and teach them a lesson. If they will not flee, then slay them on the spot!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Brittlebark invaders in the Growthworks.
QuestData.RewardText: Good. It is the way of nature for the stronger to prevail.
